Prepare matrix

Source: R/rp.R
rp_prep.Rd

Prepare matrix

rp_prep(
  RP,
  emRad = NULL,
  DLmin = 2,
  VLmin = 2,
  HLmin = 2,
  DLmax = length(Matrix::diag(RP)),
  VLmax = length(Matrix::diag(RP)),
  HLmax = length(Matrix::diag(RP)),
  AUTO = FALSE,
  chromatic = FALSE,
  matrices = FALSE,
  doHalf = FALSE
)

Arguments

RP

Recurrence plot

emRad

Radiuc

DLmin

Minimal diagonal line length

VLmin

Minimal vertical line length

HLmin

Minimal horizontal line length

DLmax

Maximal diagonal line length

VLmax

Maximal vertical line length

HLmax

Maximal horizontal line length

AUTO

Is this an AUTO RQA?

chromatic

Chromatic RQA?

matrices

Return Matrices?

doHalf

Analyse half of the matrix?

Value

A prepped matrix
